query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'announcements';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EmYiUJsZhACerp.0e9436e27250 --database c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6 --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'announcements';
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE
id	int
title	varchar
message	text
isImportant	tinyint
subjectId	int
userId	int
createdAt	timestamp
updatedAt	timestamp
